author: {'steamid': '76561198152700515', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 6318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3778, 'last_played': 1598936415}
review: DCB is certainly a title that is worth the money, considering all that you are offered within it.  You design your own car's chassis, suspension, and body panels, then link the engine to your vehicle's wheels with a transmission, then place steering rods in order to turn the vehicle.  You are given the power to fine tune your suspension, engine, transmission, wheels and steering to make and perfect your vehicle.  For the price of $15.  I have never played or heard of a racing game that is THIS in depth.  Definitely recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020732415', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 228983, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 963, 'playtime_at_review': 20856, 'last_played': 1712201327}
review:
Les cartes deviennent se remplissent petit à petit au fil des mises à jours. On peut choisir le temps d'une carte ( matin, midi, nuit, il y a 5 ou 6 choix)

L'aerodynamisme et des turboreacteurs sont présents, qui sont tous les deux réglables (comme tout dans le jeu)  ce qui donne la possibilité de créer autres choses que des voitures, comme des avions, helico, vaisseaux, robots mécanique, bras mécanique, hélices etc...

Le mode edit est pratique, on peut créer sous tous les angles des vues.

J'espere qu'il y aura un multijoueur en temps réel dans le futur, même sans collision ce serait sympa. Ca permettrait d'avoir plus d'amusement que de créativité, pour se détendre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198829596150', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1547983422}
review: Ребзя, как сделать привод от мотора к шасси? прям поэтапно опишите
developer_response: Взять запчасть "Трансмиссия". Входящим концом подцепить к средней фиолетовой точке двигателя. Выходящим концом (тот который с набалдажником) подключить ее к центру колеса. (не к оси колеса, а именно к центральной точке колеса)   Также если запчасть трансмиссия выделена, в окне этой запчасти справа вверху есть иконка с изображением знака вопроса. Если ее нажать то показана схема как подключать.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042823560', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 2917, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 846, 'last_played': 1629292971}
review:
Ой да как я не старался,все равно центральная ось автомобиля,блэ. Прокручивается как спираль,два раза получилось собрать какую-то фигню,ну я на ней боком валил,даже получалось как например в гоночных симулятор,но стоило что-то мне поменять и опять же,ось начиналась просто прокручиваться или поршни работали во внутрь или наружу,или когда жмешь на D поворачивает на лево. 
И короче говоря,всем советую,здесь можно сделать и собрать что угодно,хоть большую куколд машину.
Тем более есть масса контента в воркшопе,это и танки,самолеты,суперкары и т.д. Все создано талантливыми игроками,если уж вкрайняк не получается собрать свою тачелу,то вы можете просто взять уже готовую основу из воркшопа и клеить на нее панели,чтобы это уже было похожим на тачелу. 
Моя оценка 1/10 фактории (не знаю,мне просто это хотелось написать) 5/10 скрап механик, 8/10 стрит легал рейсинг, 10/10 ассэта корса епт.
Еще раз,короче, повторяю,игра того стоит. 349 рублёв за такую интересную,за такую замечательную цену вы ни где не найдете такую мозго-ламблю (ну вы поняли )0)0)))

author: {'steamid': '76561198218832393', 'num_games_owned': 131, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1719, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1645347979}
review:
Revising my review to one that provides detailed feedback rather than just being a whiny little shit.

     It seems like a cool game, but the main issue I have with it is learning the game-- the tutorial could definitely be improved. A good rule of thumb is to always assume the user is a fucking dumbass that knows nothing, so that nothing is skipped over. For example, the tutorial never explains what each part does and how they work together. I really would like to make a vehicle from scratch, but I don't know what I'm doing enough to know where to even start.

     It also isn't very well organized, crossing the camera and editor controls with the tutorials on how to make an effective vehicle haphazardly. Maybe organize the tutorial into broader categories, such as garage controls, vehicle controls, and vehicle design so that users can find what they need to know.

     Also, in my opinion, the editor just doesn't feel that comfortable. I'm not sure what the big issue is that makes it this way, and it might just because I'm stressed out right now, but it just feels off somehow. However, there are some adjustments that I would suggest. Add some more options to the editor, such as an option to toggle real view or center your vehicle in the build area. Could also toggle the grid being visible. You could also add an option to change the defaults of some of these toggles (including ones already there such as the orthographic/perspective toggle) 

     I'm lucky I just discovered that one of the youtubers I like played this game, so I'll watch his videos to try and understand how to build. Will update this if I find any other noteworthy things I wish to comment on once I get the hang of things.
developer_response:
The description of the game:
"Designing the perfect frame and steering system is no simple matter. If you are interested, and are up for the challenge, this game is for you!"

By the way: Space Engineers don't have the soft-body physics. This is a completely different way of creating designs.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998966875', 'num_games_owned': 29, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 6875, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1306, 'last_played': 1600322049}
review: Not what I was hoing for. I was hoping this would be a simular updated version of the Apple II game from the early 80's it isnt. The Apple game was educational, dealing with different car components and configurations. sucessful designs were the goal. In this game, it's incredibly hard to design vehicles, and realistically you're designing car frames, and not at all accurrately. If you don't have multiple frames in triangle shapes, your car will fall apart in any shape but the default. Designing steering and suspension is near imossible, and the tutorial is useless. If you change the angles of anything it will cease to work. Any changes to the engine come from "upgrades" using points gathered from racing or freeriding there's no design modifications available for the engine. So ultimately, there's no design choices to make better cars, just upgrade the default. any tinkering of any design will be a tedius exercise in mostly failure. I don't think this is fun at all from a design standpoint (I'm a 3D modeler) It is not educational in terms of car design or components, most functional designs for the game  would never work in the real world because the driver would require a frame through the belly, or the engine. The old apple game would do wind tunnel tests on yur design, you could alter gearbox ratios, and select several options for suspension brakes and engines, when you were done it'd be taken on a track by a car critic and you'd get feedback on your design. With this, if your car doesn't fall apart while loading, consider yourself a success. The only things that can be learned here is about suspension and steering, but do not exactly correlate with real world terms or physics... somehow frame  pieces extend and distort and cars bottom out. There are no wheel brackets or swingarm brackets, they merely share points on frame pieces. to make a realistic looking car body, you'll use houndreds of Frame pieces, ,and as previously stated each one must make a triange, reinforced with other triangles. This is not how frames are made it is not how bodies are made, this game has nothing to do with how cars are made. It is somewhat fun driving, but the design aspects are really weak, frustrating and not real world.
developer_response:
1. "Designing steering and suspension is near imossible" - 

Try to open the other people's cars. There are thousands well-made cars on the game server or Workshop. If you want to buy a game, read the description first: 
"Designing the perfect frame and steering system is no simple matter"

2. "to make a realistic looking car body, you'll use houndreds of Frame pieces" -

You can use the Decoration part: just import an .obj file from any 3d editor (if you are a 3D modeler, you should understand that)

3. "There are no wheel brackets or swingarm brackets, they merely share points on frame pieces."-

But you can do your own brackets as you want, see these cars: https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/browse/?appid=488550&requiredtags[]=Cars

4. By the way. I am already working on the manual gearbox with gearbox ratios. It will be available in the next update. (ALREADY DONE)

author: {'steamid': '76561198263249107', 'num_games_owned': 4496, 'num_reviews': 736, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1527856234}
review:
Впечатляющий по своей основательности инженерный автомобильный конструктор. Тут вы не просто ставите стойку, двигатель или колесо на свой автомобиль, но и задаёте все нужные параметры для этого узла, проверяете его соответствие другим узлам автомобиля, настраиваете геометрию кузова, вам нужно предусмотреть множество нюансов и подумать о множестве деталей. Хотите освоить стезю конструктора автомобилей? Это очень реалистичный симулятор процесса.

Собранный автомобиль вы можете отправить для проверки на гоночную трассу, вернуть обратно, что-то поменять и снова проверить результат в деле. В игре есть мастерская, так что процесс творчества сразу выходит на нужный уровень.

Быть может в вас спит гениальный авто-конструктор, но вы этого не знаете? попробуйте, возможно вас ждёт соответствующая кафедра в МАДИ или место в спортивной команде Редбул.

Меня очень впечатлил серьёзный инженерный подход к делу.


[i]Игра была получена по программе взаимодействия с кураторами.
Больше обзоров в [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/28776273/] кураторской группе[/url].[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198348067113', 'num_games_owned': 30, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 41464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15355, 'last_played': 1688533691}
review: I think this game is great! Its a bit rough around the edges but its still in development (of course at the time im posting this.) If you like to build and design cars from scratch then this is your game! when you build they are no limits, you can be detailed or not, realistic or not, or if you dont feel like building there is an endless amount of creations you can download.  I dont know what makes this game addicting but it just is, just being able to make my own complicated suspension systems, or being able to make my own race or car, or being able to re create cars detailed down to the interior makes it all worth it. And your not only limited to land, ever since the aerodynamics update you can now build aircraft, properly working high downforce cars, or even a rockets since there is also jet engines. Since its in development the game is always updating, and i like that the devolper actually listens to what you have to say, unlike some popular racing games *cough* cough* *Forza*. but anyways if you are into building vehicles to the most amount of detail you can, this is the game you want. Its fun, addicting, and there is always updates that usually improve the game massively or minorly. The game is also optimized very well and glitches are usually minor, unless if you try to break physics the game will hold its ground and do what its supposed to do, and the softbody physics really do top off the game. If you are overwhelmed when you frist pick it up dont worry, you will learn quickly, and if you think you built the best creation ever, trust me, someone did better, and that is why you learn new building techniqes and practice, becuase when you know you've built something the best you possibly can, you have made a masterpiece in this game, and if someone did better than you, at least you know you did your best and others will apreciate that in this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198299964918', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 4119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 701, 'last_played': 1623768345}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198006782854', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 15565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12942, 'last_played': 1628974151}
review: This is an excellent game for anyone who likes to build machines or tune and race cars, I can spend hours tinkering with and trying to perfect my cars.  You can build any sort of awesome or wacky vehicle you want to win races, cruise around the maps or just to watch its fold around a coloumn in slow motion.  There's a bit of a learning curve but the workshop is full of differnt vehicles to help you out if your having trouble building your own.  The game is constantly improving and I recomend it in its current state unless you need to have multyplayer (no mp atm) but I got my moneys worth I'll tell ya what.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020897884', 'num_games_owned': 148, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 7508, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4790, 'last_played': 1706463435}
review:
This is a great game for anyone seeking a challenge in designing their own vehicles in such a way that is limited mostly to your own imagination. I say challenge as whether you go for simple or very complicated designs you'll be repeatedly coming back to the garage tweaking and tuning your new build.

Before you get that far however there are a few things you'll need to know:
1. The tutorial while a little confusing at first is a great reference once you start trying to build vehicles for yourself
2. If you're struggling with designs that simply won't work browse the workshop to see how other people have made their designs work (moving parts, suspension and steering)
3. Each part you add to a vehicle is itself customisable, be sure to check individual parts for their characteristics if a design isn't working for you such as its weight or strength 
4. The game is still early access at this point, but improvements are frequent and bugs are rare. Having said that, save your work frequently to avoid loses to build progress

The game itself features two main gameplay types, the career and the sandbox. In career mode you earn gold by doing small races over the different maps or by simply driving around and collecting coins. In turn you can use these to add more parts to your career car and upgrade existing parts. The sandbox mode allows unresticted car building and fully upgradable parts. Here you can let your imagination run wild and create vehicles as realistic or fictional as you desire.

Personally I've enjoyed the sanbox mode the most, challenging myself to build more realistic vehicles and occasionally upload better builds to the workshop. The graphics in this game are nothing special on full, however the focus is more on the design and testing of builds with the majority of your time being spent in the garage anyway. 

To sum up, this is a great little game, one you can sink many hours into. The developer is constantly active and listening to the community looking for game improvements and solving bugs as they come up rather than waiting for the game to become unplayable. If you are looking for a simple, slow paced game with a high skill ceiling, this is it!

author: {'steamid': '76561197997668648', 'num_games_owned': 432, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3573, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2339, 'last_played': 1569165717}
review:
Dream Car Builder offers the player a very wide range of possible vehicles to build. Provided parts allow for both land and air vehicles and the softbody simulation makes for very realistic behaviour as well as it makes complex suspensions and other mechanisms possible. Although I personally only ever use the sandbox mode, challenging yourself with limited money in races is quite fun as well.
I would recommend the game to anyone who's interested in engineering, cars, aircraft etc.

author: {'steamid': '76561198114388276', 'num_games_owned': 118, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 556, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1657732164}
review: Одна из немногих игр, где внимание уделено всем мелочам, по сути замена BeamNG

author: {'steamid': '76561198064115201', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 384, 'last_played': 1615343736}
review:
Ну, как я заметил, что-то вроде BeamNG. Однако я бы не сказал что все так хорошо.
Во первых, в нашем мире продавать синглплеер игры по 300 рублей как-то дороговато. Да, тут есть прохождение на время с призраками других игроков, но это уже устарело и не интересно.
Во вторых сразу один большой минус. Нет настройки джойстика для управления.
Не очень большие карты.

Из хорошего - ориентация на постройку машин. Физика повреждений похожа на BNG. Можно сооружать машины самых разных форм и размеров. Даже есть проекты по созданию самолетов.

Upd: Наконец-то появилось управление с джойстиком.
developer_response:
Спасибо, за отзыв. Буду учитывать ваши мысли при разработке. Управление рулем и джойстиком - на очереди. Еще одна новая карта уже в работе.

Главное отличие от Beam.NG - это возможность самому создавать и совершенствовать машины прямо в игре. Это больше игра для инженеров, чем для гонщиков, именно поэтому, она была переименована с "Dream Car Racing 3D" на "Dream Car Builder". Учту ваши мысли, постоянно думаю, как можно реализовать мультиплеер.

Thanks for playing this game.
This is a sandbox game, where you can compete with other players. The single player mode is for the tutorial only and it is endless. Also, you can change the difficulty of the opponents as you want.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108821543', 'num_games_owned': 146, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 17543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13094, 'last_played': 1684488324}
review:
良い点：
自由な発想で自分の作りたい車を自由に作れます。
モンスタートラックにジェットエンジンと翼を付けて空も飛べます。
クラッシュして部品が壊れるのも面白い。

悪い点：
剛性が足りないというか、ちょっとフニャフニャ感がありますが、これは仕方がないことです。
それから、車軸のバリエーションが欲しいと感じます。

総合評価：
アイディアが無ければ面白くないでしょうが、アイディアがあれば無限に遊べます。

追記：
プレイ時間が200時間を超えたので再レビューします。

最初は歪む車体と跳ねる車に四苦八苦していたのですが、全体の剛性やサスペンションのバランスを調整することで、実車並みの安定感を得られることを知りました。てこの原理を応用すると問題が解決する場合もあります。

ジェットエンジンを利用した回転ローターでヘリコプターも作りましたが、遠心力で歪む自作エンジンに苦労しつつ、何度も失敗しながらも最終的に飛んだときは感動しました。

最近はネットで入手した３Dモデル用ブループリントを作成画面の壁紙にし、荷台に１万馬力のエンジンを積んだ軽トラを作ったりしています（複数のエンジンを繋げると一つの巨大エンジンとして機能します）。コーナーでは遠心力で倒れやすいので、伸縮ロッドを利用してハンドルを切る方向に荷台のエンジンが傾くギミックを追加してみたり、色々と楽しんでいます。

アイディア次第で大抵のことは実現できる奥の深いゲームだと思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198001212957', 'num_games_owned': 260, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 11952, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2190, 'last_played': 1698606625}
review: Este juego es un golazo, no tendra grandes graficos o el motor de fisica mas realista del mundo, pero armando tus propios coches te la pasas jugando hasta que te quebras los dedos, solo le haria falta un modo multijugador mas trabajado con pistas armadas en categorias por ejemplo una de asfalto, un rally otra offroad, por lo demas excelente juego

author: {'steamid': '76561198031675374', 'num_games_owned': 745, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1514838034}
review:
This game is basically a better, more in-depth Besiege except that you race cars rather than trying to ruin a small kingdom.

If you ever wanted a game where you can spend an entire hour figuring out how to build a real life suspension and then recklessly driving your hand-crafted masterpiece into a wall at 100kph just to see how splendidly it can splatter - this is a game for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198312226901', 'num_games_owned': 98, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 2175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1531922058}
review:
Игра реально хороша, и стоит своих денег. Но в ней мало разнообразия, например, мало разнообразных деталей для строительства, нет выбора стандартных разных карт для сандбокса. Также в редакторе управление не очень удобное... Лучше было бы сделать поворот на ПКМ а двигать на среднюю кнопку мыши.
Мне очень понравилась система строительства!
developer_response:
Спасибо за отзыв. Не понял: "Нет выбора стандартных разных карт". Может вы имеете в виду, что 8 стандартных карт это мало?

В настройках добавлена возможность менять клавиши мыши.

author: {'steamid': '76561198276241312', 'num_games_owned': 52, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2971, 'last_played': 1614476170}
review:
[h1]*BOM PARA CARAMBA COMPRA MEU*[/h1]
Jogo esse jogo desde 2014 e sempre criei muitos carros estranhos e legais
Comprei esse jogo logo quando descobri que lançou
aqui vão alguns pontos
Prós
- Legal
- Tem sandbox
- RoKo0 aumenta o preço porque ta barato
- Leve
- Da pra usar o carro do pessoal

Contras
- Díficil de fazer carro
- Matemática errada: um carro de 3000 kilos com 1200 cavalos é mais lento do que sua mãe, aquela gorda andando na 
  esteira colossal dela
 
Tirando isso o jogo é bem legal, e vale a pena comprar, você não vai se arrepender

author: {'steamid': '76561197999226799', 'num_games_owned': 532, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 5321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5310, 'last_played': 1604070478}
review: i think that most people know what side of the fence they are, if you love building things, if you love cars, get this game and dont look back =) the building is simple to get started but quickly gets harder as you try to tune your first suspension setup, then you go into the world environment, realise your car didnt have supports and then its back to the drawing board! this game is really good fun, sucks up pleanty of time and the end result is wonderful. steam workshop has tons of things to look at and the dev is working hard to add new things. only thing that would push this game over into legendary would be decent MP gameplay. other than that its amazing. =) well worth it!

review: Игра получилась отличная, только вот акцент на гонки, такое себе. В DCR EVO нужно было констрировать ниболее эффективную машину изходя из местности и доступных финансов, а тут всего один движок можно поставить, турбины ставить нельзя в гонках, только во фри ране просто так полетать можно. Был бы смысл пользоваться всеми возможностями конструктора когда достаточно пользоваться базовой машинкой просто нажимая кнопку "улучшить всё".
developer_response: Спасибо за отзыв. В режиме песочнице можно соревноваться с другими игроками, для этого и нужны все запчасти. В соревнованиях можно использовать турбины. Режим одиночной игры пока служит только для того чтобы разобраться в постройке машин и пройти учебник.

author: {'steamid': '76561198207715305', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 45500, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12801, 'last_played': 1710622050}

author: {'steamid': '76561198230720616', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 6792, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3015, 'last_played': 1654025315}
review:
I have to say, this is probably one of the more interesting games I've come across in recent months. I like the simplicity of it, I keep building monster truck chasis and even built a dragster just cause. There are many neat things I like about this game, like the ability to adjust about anything. 

As much as I like this game, there is one thing I would like to see happen with it. Well, actually a few. 

1. Add a veriety of different types of engines, such as V8s, 4 cylenders, V6s, and even V12s.

2. It would also be nice to fully adjust how much horse power you can give a vehicle you build rather then being stuck at 200 something horse power, I'd like to give my monster trucks a more realistic level of HP, somewhere along the lines of 1200-1500 hp. 

But other then those two things, I really enjoy this game, it's nice to unwind with, get creative and have fun.

*update* 4/13/2018

As great as this game is, there is something I find extremely annoying now. When joing parts together such as the frame, it starts taking away other parts that you join together, it's becoming a more irritating and complicated procedure where it doesn't need to be. 
 The game is still somewhat fun but I think the transmission could use a little more work and it just seems pretty funny to have two driveshifts coming straight from the block right directly to the wheels, could use a bit more refining in that department.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030102368', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 789, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 458, 'last_played': 1599472764}
review:
Интресно, но
1. Диаметр колес не влияет на момент вращения
2. Нельзя настраивать передаточные числа двигателя(коробки передач)
3. Описание настройки амортизаторов не для обывателя
4. запустил гонку, вышел в гараж, появился в поле, где гонка?
5. Мерзкий звук двигателя
6. при приближении для мелкой деталировки необходимо динамическое изменние структуры конструкции( приблизил, детали стали тоньше и четче), а то получается что приблизил и как ногами в жир сел
7. на одних треугольних обшивки много не сделаешь, необходима точка для выгибания детали и повышение количества соединяемых точек.
8. Как сменить рисунок протектора?
developer_response:
Спасибо за отзыв. Многое из того, что вы перечислили дествительно требует доработки и это есть в моих планах
Отвечу по пунктам:
1. Диаметр колес не влияет на момент вращения
Если бы это не настраивалась автоматически, тогда игроку при каждом изменении размера колеса, пришлось бы всегда регулировать, еще и передаточное число для этого колеса, причем на эту же величину. Сейчас можно строить колеса с разными размерами без проблем.

2. Нельзя настраивать передаточные числа двигателя(коробки передач)
Механическая коробка передач есть в плане разработки, там и передаточные числа будут.

3. Описание настройки амортизаторов не для обывателя
Вот здесь не понял, прошу пояснить.

4. запустил гонку, вышел в гараж, появился в поле, где гонка?
Вы говорите об одиночной игре или песочнице? На какой карте это? Если о песочнице, то сейчас надо нажать на кнопку "Соревнования", чтобы выбрать соревнование на сервере. А вообще я скоро буду менять интерфейс карты, и список соревнований будет меняться сразу.

5. Мерзкий звук двигателя
Звуки будут дорабатываться.

6. при приближении для мелкой деталировки необходимо динамическое изменние структуры конструкции( приблизил, детали стали тоньше и четче), а то получается что приблизил и как ногами в жир сел
При приближении детали, меняется радиус чувствительности точек и рам, это позволяет легче выбирать разные детали, но визуальный радиус не меняется. И такая опция есть в планах разработки.

7. на одних треугольних обшивки много не сделаешь, необходима точка для выгибания детали и повышение количества соединяемых точек.
Скоро будет внедряться в игру возможность запекать детали, для создания декоративных твердых запчастей, для них не будет рассчитываться физика и их можно будет делать сложными без ущерба для производительности.

8. Как сменить рисунок протектора?
Сейчас нельзя, это есть в планах разработки.

Здесь в обсуждениях можно найти некоторые вещи из планов разработки:
https://vk.com/dcr3d

author: {'steamid': '76561198287158198', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 62473, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42646, 'last_played': 1710564797}
review:
Помимо "ничего" для строительства, стоило бы ещё добавить пункты "минимальное количество рам и панелей" камбеком с Кб 3D
  Больно видеть контрастную технику от ралли до самоката с как-бы офигенным регламентом, которого тоже нет
/НУ ДАЙТЕ ВЫ УЖЕ ДЕТАЛИ и чтобы оно всё работало потом ещё  

Лично я ставлю крест на этой игре - она не позволяет ничего кроме каркаса и колёс с пружинами (всё остальное как раз создатель скинул на 3D, но увы только в наших мыслях)
  "А мы всё так и продолжаем ездить под 300 со звуками от трактора"   

Рекомендую ли я её?
Во всех прошлых отзывах я не рекомендовал её, за что пуська агрился на меня мол мешаю продажам
developer_response:
"несправляющийся i7" - если вы использовали нотбук, то, скорее всего, вы не поставили дискретную графику для игры.
Игра разрабатывалась на нотбуке i5 и тормозов не было.

"физика покрышек - ни сказать ничего, они либо ломают тебе подвеску, либо скользят как человек в гололёд"
- это вы описываете машину, которую вы сами построили или откуда-то взяли, игра тут не причем. 
В умело-сделанных машинах нет этих проблем. Посмотрите на машины других игроков, вот например: https://vk.com/dcr3d?z=video-130201847_456239020%2Fvideos-130201847%2Fpl_-130201847_-2

"Много #адротов, которые каждый раз после твоего рекорда будут ставить рекорд вечно..."
- Очень жаль, но сама игра тут не причем.

Я не знаю как вы получили  6 фпс, это надо разбираться конкретно в вашем случае. 
Можно было меня спросить, я бы возможно разобрался, почему у вас так тормозит и помог, но вместо этого вы влепили отрецательный отзыв.

PS:
Я согласен с вами, что нужен онлайн. Для физики мягких тел это не простая задача. Еще нет ни одной игры в мире с физикой мягких тел и мультиплеером. Посмотрите BeamNg.drive - у них 30 человек работают, а они не то что мультиплеер, даже запись заездов сделать не могут.
Но я думаю над этим, даже примерно знаю как это осуществить, но это не сразу.

UPDATE:

По поводу трения:
В игре принципиально используется реалистичная (не аркадная физика). Если вам нужна аркадная физика, играйте в ГТА, там сами физические законы будут помогать игроку управлять машиной.
Если вам кажется, что трение у шин маленькое, вы можете легко это замерить в игре 2-мя способами:
Поставьте максимальный апгрейд у колес и зайдите в карту Crash Test Site.

1) Попытайтесь заехать на крутой уклон, пока колеса не начнут прокручиваться, и замерить соотношение (sin(a)/cos(a)) - это будет коэффициент трения, (a - угол уклона)
На карте Crash Test Site у меня получилось 1.16.

2) Разгонитесь на ровной поверхности до 100 км/ч (27.7 м/с), затормозите ручником (он должен быть установлен для всех колес), и замерьте время торможения. (можно замедлить время в игре, чтоб удобнее было замерять)
У меня получилось 2.5 с. Коэффициент трения = (Скорость/(9.8 * Время)) = 27.7 м/с / (9.8*2.5) = 1.13

Коэффициент трения в реальном мире и в игре не зависит от того боком вы скользите или нет.

Для справки: в реальном мире коэффициент трения между шиной и асфальтом меньше 1.

author: {'steamid': '76561198256505402', 'num_games_owned': 14, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1868, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1230, 'last_played': 1668191884}
review:
Игра супер, очень интересная, но все портит одно НО .... Она лагает...  ноутбук с I3 и GT940m, в заездах периодически начинает жутко тормозить на пару секунд, из-за этого трассу невозможно ехать на время. Хотя по мониторингу ни процессор, ни видеокарта не загружены на 100%.
Исправлю отзыв, если игра перестанет тормозить.
developer_response:
Игра разрабатывалась на более слабом нотбуке, и тормозов не было, скорее всего дело в настройках вашего нотбука:

1) Какой точно процессор и память имеет нотбук?
2) Тормозит ли без соперников в свободной езде?
3) Зависят ли тормоза от количества соперников? (Кол-во соперников можно устанавливать в окне трассы)
4) Зависят ли тормоза от карты?
5) Зависят ли тормоза от определенного места на карте?
6) Зависят ли тормоза от того куда повернута камера? (например на соперников или от них)
7) Установлена ли для игры дискретная или мобильная графика в настройках NVidia? (для steam.exe и для dcr3d_x64.exe: в настройках высокпроизводительный процессор NVIDIA или интегрированное графическое оборудование)

author: {'steamid': '76561198322432203', 'num_games_owned': 133, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1655, 'last_played': 1654201080}
review: Great tool for experimenting with vehicle designs. Very high level of customization. I haven't encountered any bugs. 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198068215097', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 7243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4935, 'last_played': 1695459737}
review:
Замечательная игра!

Всё ограничено только деталями присутствующими в этой игре и вашей собственной фантазией. 
Здесь есть платы корпуса, трубы, для конструкции рамы корпуса и прочего, моторы, реактивные ускорители, фары, пружины и поршни. Каждая деталь имеет настройки физических свойств и внешнего вида. например панелям можно задать физику крыла и сделать на  основе этого летательный аппарат. Можно трубам задать нужную толщину,вес и жосткость. Детали можно перекрашивать в любой цвет. Очень удобная палитра. Пока есть только матовый цвет. Металлик и другие варианты возможно будут добавлены позже.

Эту игру делает один человек, так давайте сделаем эту игру вместе!!! Поможем разработчику! Он по возможности отвечает всем и старается сделать игру лучше.

Рекомендую всем любителям песочниц!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198251507002', 'num_games_owned': 4, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1722, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1280, 'last_played': 1514980109}

author: {'steamid': '76561198048780642', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 1552, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 877, 'last_played': 1535127472}
review:
A nice little game thats headed in the right direction. Its in the good hands of a sole developer who isnt lazy and is constantly improving the aspects of his game.

There is a pretty in-depth building system here and lots of time can be wasted making cool designs. The physics are also quite complex and fairly realistic.

Its currently lacking content. No AI races, multiplayer, manual transmission and controller support. As it stands, its a damn good car-building game.

review: 这不是赛车游戏,希望想要买的朋友不要误解了,当年他们还是网页版的时候,在各大网站分类就是物理模拟类的游戏,是工艺沙盒类的建造游戏. 建造的自由度非常的强大,已经不局限于赛车了,模拟飞机的空气动力都能做出来,还配有喷气飞机的部件.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025089345', 'num_games_owned': 2174, 'num_reviews': 2934, 'playtime_forever': 2536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 537, 'last_played': 1561604240}
review:
一款自己拼车的游戏····

喜欢拼车的大佬可以试试···哦···创意工坊里面有好多流弊的车哦···

review:
I dont really know exactly how to write a good review never have wrote one before but i just had to write one up for this game so here it goes 
To start i gotta say there is not to much i have to say for a bad review so ill doo that first lol
 I MISS the when you would have to connect to wheels to the motor with the frame option of transmission i do believe it was it was great but maybe make it option just for looks and i really liked that  but the only other complains i had have already been fixed so no point even discussing those 
So now that thats over with lets get on with the good 
 Now like im sure the bit of bad there shows this game has no reason not to play it yes it is a little confusing at first to learn how things work together and what you can and cant do but quickly get easier and easier to get the hang of things and there are many hits to help you along the way. 
this game gets updates often and continues to grow into something even batter than it was I myself have bought and played this game since the day it was early access on steam the second i could get my hands on it i did lol and it was worth ever penny and i have built quite a few different vehicles now i may have only posted 2 of them because they are either not done yet or just not quite the way i wanted them to go and either deleted them or just left them if not to overly bad just need work lol but i will continue to build contraptions in this game and looking forward to watchin it grow even more 
in all i have absoloutly no complaints about this game in anyway 
the only suggestion i do have is bring back those transmission frames and  one major one 
A new cockpit something close to what it would be in an actual car instead of a quad style though keep the orginal one awsell as its not always you are building that type of vehicle but i dont know if u could do a 2 seater thing or just one seat with the driver and steering wheel and pedals and then a just empty seat to be able to make 2 and 4 or more seater vehicles 

thank you for making this great game i have 129 hrs into this game and i plan to have many many more into ill play this game forever and never loose intrist in it (and that says alot for a game now a days in my opinion )

author: {'steamid': '76561198302243996', 'num_games_owned': 381, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 17183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4612, 'last_played': 1687544372}
review:
This game is definitely a recommender for people who love cars, jets, or anything like that.
I played the free 2D Evo version, and had a lot of fun. The fact that this game is now in 3D is even better.

In short: I love this game

The game can be a little bit complicated from time to time, but after you know the basics, it gets easier. (I still have trouble with the suspension :p)

Now, don't be all "oh no, this game is crappy, it's broken", because it isn't broken, yes, it may lack a bit of content, but  remember: THIS GAME IS IN EARLY ACCESS, so don't expect the biggest things in this game, it's not finished yet, and the developer is still working on it.

This game requires at leat a little bit of knowledge of what you're doing. This game is a game where you design, and engineer your vehicle. If you like games like KSP, Scrap Mechanic, Space Engineers, or any games that requires some thinking, this is a game for you. But keep in mind, every joint is capable of rotation on every axis, and will do so!

Or, if you like stress-testing other people's cars, planes etc, then you can do that. Like experimenting, engineering, planning, designing, and thinking about your creations? Then this is a game for you!

review:
Some days ago i was browsing threw my steam profile and i saw that i had reviewed this games 2 years ago. That review was rather agressive from my side so i decided to test again this game and review it again.
This game has some really good thing and some that are not so good.

Positives:

The Developer pays atention to this game comunity; He even answered to my review i did 2 years ago and i didn't even realised ;sory.


The comunity seems to be very active

The game has good physics


Negatives:

The engines sound like they are screaming in pain

It is like REALLY hard to build something. There are some tutorials rhat i played and in 2017 i watched plenty of videos abot Dream Car Building and still i can' get anything to work.(i have 9 total hours on this game)

there is not much to do besides  trying to build something.


I let you jugde if its worth buying  this game. I personally don't recomend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041628378', 'num_games_owned': 1502, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 1051, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1001, 'last_played': 1586667819}
review:
Dream Car Racing 3D is a very interesting game. I enjoy it for what it is, but it certainly has its own audience. The building aspect of the game is very easy to learn, but building the right thing is tough. There are tutorials but they are somewhat scant, your best bet is to look at some high-rated community made vehicles and study them. See how they made their suspension and steering work. This will you climb the learning curve alot faster, and once you mount the summit, the game is much more satisfying. 

All in all, I personly love the game, it is wide open in terms of what you can do. From rock-crawling trucks to supercars and tanks, there really is no limit here. If you like building, and have a persistant mind, this is where you should go.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167069402', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 446, 'last_played': 1505696457}
review:
Having been contacted again about this mess and spending another day trying to explain the issues-

This game is worth watching an ad to play.

As for the creation process they added the coloration system I recommended in the comments below to help alleviateate bad connections and tha'ts nice, but the new UI is rather unintuitive, more cluttered and ununiform then before, and with sevral genrations of art all visable from the same place showing clearly what work is being done I ask to what end?


I've been assured all my complaints are understood in the same breath as being told I only have personal resons for my negative review, I think having a single dev doing all the work is silly, that's personal opinion, Having a car design game with only one very repetitive, unrelistic engine sound that 4/5 people think is a fart efect before knowing whats going on! I think is a ligit issue.

My biggest issue right now is a tie between the deformations that come with soft body physics being excessive to the point of looking like youtuber bait and the idea that I should have to say something nice as well if I'm going to point that out.

The contributing modder who contacted me most recently seems to think I should delete this review beacuse of what the game could become but I know it could just get worse. I was on Star Wars Galaxies for NGE and had friends who killed themselves after the combat update. You can't sell me a promise, I don't pay for words, I see what patron has become! between sarkeesian's and s-purple's that shit don't jive.

I've been reported for harassment then harassed, I've seen some of the least self aware people in the industry try to explain themseves and get pissy with me, even so far as recomending my account be deleted.

I'm told the work is tireless, its not hard to set up a stream to just show that your working, I mentoned S-purple? I think the amount of work going into this project is embarising. otherwise there would be better transparency. I'm all for making a living on your pet project but as a reviwer I set out to tell you what its worth and honestly as it stands, not a lot. If you wan't to play this game learn to make games and you will have a more rewarding if not easier time.

Matter of fact, regardless of how much work you put in to makeing a car in this game it can be expected to funtion normaly for less then a minute without having it reset you on the track without deformations. The mutations your creation get trying to acclerate, turn or bank are more like a nightmare then a dream and realy put a dampner on the whole race thing. 



"Developer response:
RoKo0  [developer] Posted: Jul 25 @ 7:09pm
Just read his answers. 
He has leaved his negative review because of: 
"SFX", "wrap your stages or use spheres, invisable walls are brutal", etc"

You know what RK0, you do need to work on SFX and the invisable walls are brutal so I do recomend you use spheres or have your limited stages wrap. Also yeah please read some of the comment section...
developer_response:
Just read his answers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198195095702', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 387, 'last_played': 1500656598}
review:
This game offers so much in the genre of car building. First off, This may be Early Access game, But what's neat is the developer is very active and open to feedback, so it gets updates and isn't dead. I do say it offers great realstic soft body movement of joints and frame, though the steering is still arcade-like as of now.

My Main focus with my time spent thus far has been very entertaining, the camera system may take some time getting used to but works well. I would like to finalize by saying this game suits anyone who enjoys sandbox style building/soft-body games and/or just wants to test there skills or learn something new about a design and such.

author: {'steamid': '76561198333955540', 'num_games_owned': 23, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 10454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5550, 'last_played': 1593981623}
review:
,,Dream Car Racing 3D'' to gra, w której możemy sami zbudować swój wymarzony (lub też nie) pojazd. Tak w zasadzie to nie tylko pojazd, ale wszystko, co chcemy, jeśli jesteśmy odpowiednio kreatywni. Robimy to przy pomocy dostępnych w grze elementów: belek, kół, silników, sprężyn, paneli, świateł, siłowników. Wszystko to możemy dowolnie konfigurować. Gdy już zbudujemy pojazd lub inne ,,coś'', to wybieramy sobie mapę i... sprawdzamy, czy nasze dzieło działa czy też nie. W każdej chwili możemy wrócić do projektowania i w razie potrzeby poprawić określone rzeczy. 
W każdym razie gra już daje bardzo dużo możliwości, a że jest to wczesny dostęp to będzie nadal ulepszana i dopracowywana. Produkt jest naprawdę godny polecenia.

author: {'steamid': '76561198166413706', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 9696, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 33, 'playtime_at_review': 3016, 'last_played': 1712389252}
review:
[h1]In A Nut Shell[/h1]
An amazing sandbox game that allows you to create Cars, Jets & maps with its ingame easy to use yet powerful tools.
The players have built things beyound cars and jets using the current tools in the game as of this review . 
Race Against high score ghosts that are set based on the best "Time Trial" score.
Share your builds or download others using workshop -or- using the games own website that is connected directly to the game's build mode.

[b]Did I mention that there is damage physics in this game !!? Yes crash away like burnout all you want and if that wasnt enough you can slow down time burn out style and watch it all happen.[/b] 



[h1] Tool system [/h1]
Im still pretty new to the game but as seen below the tool system is one of the most powerful ingame tools i have seen so far and easy to use with its point to point frame dots + physics system and precise collisioning so you can toss away the games that build such things with blocks. If your the type that loves to build and want to base your builds off of some really neat & close to worldly object phsyics.

[url=https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/856096260990396084/43D1BDF9D99F31C0635EA68A3417B92444EEF54B/] Screenshot 1	[/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=951648911] Screenshot 2	[/url]





[h1]My Exp[/h1]
When I first started this game i was alittle unsure but after playing it , I spend hours building tons of personal cars as well as upgrading its parts with new ideas. As you can see i have less then 100 hours.

You can get some ideas or tips on how to build using real life car frames ( yes this game is that good ). although still a work in progress it has much to offer as long as you can thinking of what to build next.

The Dev seems very caring and on his toes to apply more updates and improvments. Just like any other work in progress you can expect bugs anf glitchs but from what i seen so far the only glitch i seen is when building complex machines the physics sometimes glicths for that part you made with such complexity.



[h1]The Commuinty[/h1]
Seems very settled so far , like all builder sandbox games you have the half that loves to download from workshop and the half that loves to build. 

[h1]Ideas[/h1]
The interaction ingame is alittle limited with interacting with other players but im sure the Dev will keep an eye out for ideas to improve this. I can't image how awesome this game will be with weapons that you can create and pvp. Perhaps a weapon creator mode & import weapons to a map. Driving over a weapon to get it. Allowing for some twisted metal combat. would be nice to have the bullets more focuses on impact driven creating dents and bending parts. Oh there i go again, im talking too much so much to explain but i do not have the time.

All in all this game is a 9/10 ( needs alittle more player interaction, perhaps an offical server with a nice map with racing and PvP. As a round ends the game mode changes as well )

author: {'steamid': '76561198311180356', 'num_games_owned': 2, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9095, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1679053918}
review:
Игра очень интересная.
Я тестировал игру еще до раннего доступа и игра сейчас выглядит намного лучше чем раньше.
Исчезли глюки с фарами, появились новые детали. 
Просьба к разработчкам: добавьте мультиплеер.
Рекомендую тем, кто любит конструирование машин и самолетов.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015310652', 'num_games_owned': 389, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 3619, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3619, 'last_played': 1497743006}
review:
見ての通り、竹ひご版の剛体シミュです。
トラス構造の強さを、空気抵抗の大きさを実感することでしょう。

サンドボックス、シングルプレイヤーのふたつのゲームモードがあります。
SPでは未舗装路に生成されるコースをエンジン1つを動力としてタイムアタックでCPUに勝ち資金を集めていくのが目的です。
CPUが強いので勝てるマシンを考えるのが凄く楽しいです。

パーツは基本的に棒状で、両端にパーツ同士を接続するポイントがあります。
任意の位置にミッドポイント(中点)やスライダーという接続ポイントを設定もできます。
自由度が高いゲームなので、どんなが出来るのか想像しやすいように、使えるパーツをリストアップします。
・Frame　(Support)
　全ての基本となるフレーム(竹ひご)。中点やスライダーを設定すると折れなくなる。
　Supportに設定すると自由に長さが伸縮する。
・Seat
　Racerが乗るシートで、必ず使うことになる、コアとなるパーツ。自動デフロックのon/offや破損の有効/無効を設定する。
　重さが固定だが、位置の調整できる3つのポイントが用意されている。
・Wheel
　車輪。タイヤはパンクしない。幅、直径、空気圧を設定できる。
・Engine
　エンジン。20～257馬力。グレードによって空冷単気筒～水冷V6まで大きさが変わる。トラクションコントロールの強さを設定できる。シングルプレイヤーでは1つのみ使用可能。
・Jet
　ジェットエンジン。40～4000馬力。シングルプレイヤーでは使用不可。
・Shock
　ショックアブソーバー。バネの強さ、減衰力、通常時、伸縮時の長さ等を設定できる。
・Rod
　ステアリングロッド。伸縮時の長さ、伸縮の速さ、車速感応値等を設定できる。
・Panel
　パネル。3点を設定して膜を貼る。空気抵抗を発生させたり、見た目の装飾になる。なんと空気抵抗を受ける面を片側のみにもできる。
・Point Settings
　ライト。前照灯、制動灯、尾灯、後退灯を設定できる。夜のシチュエーションを明るく綺麗に。
・Angle Lock
　パーツとパーツの角度を固定する。なお直線(180度)での固定はできない。
・Fix angles
　ポイント指定で一括Angle lockできる。

author: {'steamid': '76561198380626010', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 114358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12632, 'last_played': 1697246651}
review: This is an awesome game for anyone who is creative and wants to design their own vehicles. I love to experiment with different types of suspensions and try to make my cars perform as well as possible, and I like to try to invent my own suspensions and ways of making a vehicle move. I bought the game when it was on sale (25% off) but I would pay the full $15 for it if I had known exactly how great this game was. It is now my favorite computer game by far!

author: {'steamid': '76561197980217311', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1497508875}
review: This game needs a modern wheel hub/knuckle joint. A part of the wheel assembly that everything attaches to instead of what you have right now in the game.....and a steering column r&p or something. Also reintroducing any kind of a visible drive line would be nice, even if its just chain or belt. Can you also change the Angle lock to 'Welding' or something. When I weld a box frame for a car or roll cage that usually does the trick, I don't have to angle lock anything. How could two pieces of metal tubing attach to each other without welding...nevermind...

author: {'steamid': '76561198114255090', 'num_games_owned': 207, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 1255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 724, 'last_played': 1640191365}
review:
The game is awesome for someone like me. I love cars and how they work, and I love to sketch out concepts on paper. Using my design skills and knowledge of cars helped me to create my first 3 designs in a few hours.

...and if you have ADHD like me, you will probably find yourself attaching jets to the sides of your design 5 minutes after building it.

10/10 would make cars fly again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198180697153', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1022, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 788, 'last_played': 1518981436}
review: This is a great game. It's worth the money. The devolper is really friendly and asked my opinon. So here it is. The game has steam workshop so if you're not the best designer you can just simply install a car or plane or whatever someone has come up with, and then you can drive/fly it. The game says it has multiplayer I don't know if there is but I don't see anything but the devoloper will probably add it. The only con about this game is that when you use frames or supports it seems a bit unrealistic because you have to add a lot of them on the inside. But i guess that's just a challenge. Overall I would definetly recommend this to someone. And there a couple of youtubers that have videos on this game. There is tutorials so if you can't figure out how to build something just use the tutorials.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104625609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 23607, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3353, 'last_played': 1691232103}
review:
This game is simply great. 

One thing that I love about this game is that it doesn't restrict you to use some kind of pre-made blocks. Therefore you can build anything from simple cars to space-plane-tank-cranes. You can even make realistic helicopters in this game (check my creations to see proof(not self promotion just for proof)).

If your reaction to this game is:"EWW IT LOKS UGLY AND ITS NOT LIK THE GTA6 TRAILERS AND U HAVE BUILD STUF TO MOVE.", try to go outside, I bet you can't. I once heard from a 30 year old virgin that real life looks great.

+This game is WIP so, hopefully, more things will be added.

So if you you are even a little bit creative you should get this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198298947688', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2789, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2088, 'last_played': 1597431031}
review: I think that Dream Car Racing 3D has a lot of potential and that it's just an incredible game that has very good FPS rates.  I love the Soft Body Physics.  I have never played a game with Soft Body Physics, so it’s cool to be able to experience that!  The aerodynamics update was awesome!

author: {'steamid': '76561198151037201', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 20203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5534, 'last_played': 1689338509}
review:
1) very detailed soft-body physics simulation.
- player can build crumple zones and safety cells
- reinforce or lighten specific chassis areas to suit your design
- crash test in slow-mo, observe the deformations as it happens
- body flex has observable effect on vehicle ride and handling
- spring rate and damping changes, suspension geometry adjustments have impact to vehicle

2) aerodynamics simulation
- effect of Center Of Lift on Center of Mass is observable
- adjustable lift and drag coefficients
- transonic flight effects (harder to break the sonic barrier as you approach it)

Suggestions:
- add adjustable hinge properties to point settings (one way, two way, rotate only, pivot etc), will make it simpler to define movements on a point
- add driveshaft frames for power transfer (+transmissions)
- add steering frames for control transfer

author: {'steamid': '76561198093877340', 'num_games_owned': 73, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 3454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2892, 'last_played': 1497458209}
review: Limitless creative game. You can build very cool realistically detailed vehicles. 4 wheels or 40 wheels, big or small, flying or crawling, + very cool maps that you can test your builds on them(You can create your own map too). This game is awesome don't miss it ! 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198208528204', 'num_games_owned': 39, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 3834, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2532, 'last_played': 1513558561}
review: I am very impressed with what one developer can do. This is a well made game, that is open to creativity. If you know what you're doing, you can make a good vehicle. Not many glitches, but also not many features. Still, the game is new, so features such as live multiplayer should come in the future. At the time that I got the game (February 2017), there were no bad reviews. The two bad reveiws as of April 27, 2017 are stupid. One of them states how they basically could not make a car (because they are unwilling to learn), which there is evidence that you can make cars in this game. And the other is that it does not have live multiplayer, which I understand, but you should not rate a game negatively because it doesn't have a feature that it was not expected to have. For what it is supposed to be, the game is perfect. Good job, RoKo0.

author: {'steamid': '76561198170271289', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 42797, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1318, 'last_played': 1703920350}
review:
いろんなパーツとフレームで自由な発想で車から戦車はては飛行機まで作れるゲームです。
機械をいじることが好きな人なら確実にハマります。必要なのは作る意欲と根気とトライアンドエラー。
車のボディをデザインするよりもフレーム構造やサスペンションなどのパーツ機能が主題とされておりデザインするというよりは設計するという面白さが詰まっています。

古きよきラリーカーを再現するもよし、子供のころに遊んだオフロードのラジコンのようなグネグネ動く足で山を上るもあり
言語サポートに日本語がないことが日本語プレイヤーには壁に感じるかもしれませんが、大丈夫
パーツを選んでくっ付けてフィールドでテストして駄目なら構造の改善をすればそこにはあなたオリジナルの車があることでしょう。
若干の時間泥棒的要素があります。ご注意ください。

今は車や航空機といったパーツが追加されそれも自由にくみ上げられるので
ジェットエンジンつきの車などの現実離れしたものも開発できるようになっています。開発も非常にユーザーフレンドリーなようで、要望なども取り入れてくれることがあります。

以下は気になるであろう点をピックアップでご紹介しておきます。
・レースシムのようなリアルさはありません。
・ほかのシムのようにねじの一つ一つなどはイジレません。
・手の込んだロボットはつくれません。

よい点
・ブロック遊びの感覚で作れます。
・リアルでないからこそ無茶ができます。
・衝突による破損や強度不足による自壊で腹がよじれます
・車や航空機に詳しい人なら自分のアイデアしだいで夢をかなえてくれます。(リアルさはゲーム内ルールと制限による)
・ユーザー作成のモデルがダウンロードできるので、アイデアに詰まっても大丈夫

まだまだ自由なことが何をしていいか分からないという状況なのが残念なところですが自分の作りたいものを黙々とテストしていると時間があっというまです、こちらから”こういうのがつくりたい”という意欲を送ればもっももっとよいシムになると思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198073630725', 'num_games_owned': 266, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 10987, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 642, 'last_played': 1680422331}
review:
This game is what I would desribe as "This reminds me of auto cad". At first it seems very confusing but when you get into it and learn the controls it gets very addicting and time consuming.

Pros: 
Good Physics
Practically any computer can run this.
it has a very good tutorial.
Cons:
Camera controls are kind of funky
When you build more advance designs you will have trouble with parts being in the way.

"I rate 8/10 it's worth it in my opinion"- me

author: {'steamid': '76561198004330281', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 691, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 287, 'last_played': 1519530095}
review:
棒を組み合わせて、自分だけの車を作り出しましょう！
動力伝達などについては考えなくてよく、エンジンとタイヤがあれば勝手に動力がつながり回りだします。

パネキット、RigidChips、LaputanBlueprint等をやりこんだ事がある方で、
より複雑な構造を作りたいと思ったことがあればとてもお勧めできます。
秒間2000回の演算により、ズレにより演算が破綻するのはまず起きません。
タイヤがポリゴンの向こう側に突っ込んでぶっ飛んでったりもしません。
まだ使ったことはないですが秒間4000回演算のモードもあるようです。

GUIも現時点で十分使えるものになっているので、意図した構造がすぐ作れます。
参考までに初回起動後1.5時間程度でデフォルトのセミトレーリングアームの車両を
ダブルウィッシュボーンにしてまともに走るまで出来ました。

author: {'steamid': '76561198191697210', 'num_games_owned': 322, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 2232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1909, 'last_played': 1548711439}
review:
以下都是我玩single player游戏的感受
1,作为一个赛车游戏，居然只能用键盘操作，不支持手柄，没有线性输入，不能改键位，只能从3种预设好的键位里选一个，还不能同时选2个。这游戏里没有手动挡，手刹好像也没有任何作用，不知道是不是因为我没设计好我的车……
2.气死牛顿的物理引擎，车子太轻太轻，即使以20~30km/s的速度跑，遇到一丁点颠簸都会让车子四脚离地失去控制，结果你的车子就像个跳跳球一样在地上弹弹弹弹弹弹弹弹弹，弹到你失去方向，弹到你完全无法控制它。
3.好吧，既然这样我就换个全是平地的地图，结果又发现在平地上车轮似乎完全失去了摩擦力，转向的时候车子就像在溜冰一样滑腻，轻轻一按就转过头，想调整方向吧，再按一下又转过头。作者显然是在刻意去制造漂移的感觉，完全无视物理法则大幅度降低了摩擦力。
4.转向之后车子会莫名其妙的不受控制的向相反的方向转导致你转向角度太小，你必须按住转向键才不会出现这个现象，而长按方向键就会导致3里的结果，就是转向过头，可能是由于摩擦力太低，而后轮停下来了，前轮还在继续滑的原因吧……
5.第1，2，3，4点结合起来导致这个游戏操作手感极其恶劣。
6.对手像有轨电车一样精确的踩着路线匀速前进，跑得流畅顺滑，没有一丝颠簸，从来不出差错，让你弹弹弹滑滑滑的路面对它来说如履平地，150度的弯道也能很平滑的匀速开过去。对新手来说，即使是power最低的对手，难度也太高。
7.对手的车都是一个白色小方块，而不是真实玩家的游戏回放。踩着路线走，对玩家起到了不好的引导。不用真实玩家的游戏回放，无法让新手了解到正确的车辆构造和驾驶方法。
8.因为结合上面的，你出现任何一丁点小的失误都是致命的，都必然导致你成为最后一名。而这个游戏没有像尘埃那样的回放功能，没有一丁点容错的余地。
9,对手的难度的调整方式让人莫名其妙，居然受引擎和车重的影响，调到太低了居然会因为没有对手参赛导致比赛不能开始。调高了完全被碾压。而且难度设定上完全不科学，赛车比赛中，一点小的失误就能拉开十几秒的差距，这游戏里不同的难度之间只是速度简单的缩放一下。体现不出低难度对手的高失误率和高难度对手的稳定发挥之间的巨大差距。
10.很多我的车完全爬不上去的坡，或者会把我卡在里面的沟，对手都可以轻易通过。游戏里说明对手用的是你的车，这完全不科学！我造了一辆不能动的车参赛，结果“对手”居然都能开着这辆车前进，呵呵！
11.地上指路的白线不够显眼，游戏的尾随视角经常不能及时看见。两条并行的赛道上的checkpoint杆子容易让玩家跑向错误的方向。右上角的圆形雷达，应该移动到画面中间，玩家不可能同时聚精会神的注视前面的路，还看到右上角的雷达。
12.checkpoint太多，几百米到一公里多的距离内经常有10个，导致checkpoint之间距离太短！经常出现两个之间距离只有十几米这样的，你一不小心开歪了还要倒回去，注定最后一名。
13.经常出现我的车子从checkpoint的两个杆子之间通过之后却提示我错过了checkpoint的情况。
14.赛道设计充满了恶意，终点前的第二个checkpoint必定位于一个180度的急转弯，第四个十有八九是位于一个大于120度的弯道。大大增加你出错的概率，好让你从头开始。整个赛道里150度以上的急转弯太多太多太多太多太多，没有手动挡，没有手刹，一漂就停不下来，你叫我怎么过这么大的弯？“对手”能无视物理法则无视物理法则无视物理法则无视物理法则无视物理法则以很快很快的速度过弯道，好不容易在直线上领先了一点点，结果在过弯时被反超！
这个游戏其实创意挺好的，可惜被灾难性的物理引擎，奇怪的设定和“对手”的难度设定给毁掉了……购买此游戏前请三思！

author: {'steamid': '76561198070913868', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 5402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 588, 'last_played': 1698275450}
review:
It is a very fun building game if you are a car fan or just like messing with physics just a bit.
Game play is simple but it is more than enough to keep you entertained.
If you get it READ THE TOUTORALS they help out a lot. (I like figuring out things by trial and error myself but doing that took me 1/2 hour to get something that rolled arround:D)
There is a LOT that you can customize on it wheels and body as shown in the video and this game has not crashed yet so very well made for early acces.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027378697', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1950, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1583, 'last_played': 1601694642}
review:
If you like physics games, this is a very good physics game! The physics engine has a very realistic feel and it is smooth as well. 

If you're like me and you like cars, engines and mechanical engineering concepts, you'll probably enjoy this game as much as I have been. I tend to spend hours on one vehicle, tweaking suspension, frame size/weight/length/width, tires until it is just right. This game makes that kind of gameplay available. 

Where this game really shines for me is the suspension. I can't believe how amazing it looks and feels while going over bumps and taking sharp turns. The possibilities of suspensions you can make seem endless, and you're not even limited to just the shocks that are a provided part. You can even use frame parts with elasticity tweaks and come up with your own suspension designs, as you may see when checking out the workshop (which has many, awesome designs).

I personally don't like shallow and arcade-style physics games that invovles vehicles. This one is the opposite. 

Now for some reality: It is early access. The game does feel a little empty after a while. 
A big one for many - it is not multiplayer. Not a big deal for me really but I know some may not prefer that.

But, jets were just added! So one good thing about this game is that it is not done with additional content. So with that in mind, this is a good time waster. I'd say it's well worth the time I've put into it. 

Overall I give this game a thumbs up! For the price, it's definitely a good deal and plenty of enjoyment.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032741398', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1135, 'last_played': 1547916654}
review:
все помнят как в младших классах школ рисовали по точкам машинки? а теперь представьте что эти точки в 3д формате. и вы сами раставляете эти точки.

для успеха в гонках вам нужно будет хорошо продумать конструкцию вашей машины, так как количество соединений определяет жёсткость, но и увеличивает вес! много веса никуда не уедет! но и слабая рама прогнётся на первом же повороте. 

долго попотеть и над подвеской придётся, причём даже незначительные изменения в точках крепления подвески сразу меняют управляемость и поведение авто

так же игра очень понравится любителям программ 3DSмакс и Zmodeler. так как впринципе тоже самое, только потом ещё и прокатится на своей машинке можно.

молодым родителям стоит купить игру для своих детей что бы
 у них развивалось креативное мышление.
-------------------------------------------------------------------
10 разбитых машин из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198006786950', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 961, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 961, 'last_played': 1488584955}
review:
I initially bought this game for multiplayer.  The multiplayer tag was on the steam front page.  Upon purchasing the game and searching forums I realized there was no multiplayer.  It is more of a leaderboard that you can race the times of other players.

After speaking to developer he has since removed the tag and I thought it would be fair to edit my review.

The game is  a interesting idea letting you create a vehicle with simple pieces and drive around a sandbox to test your creation.  If you like physics games this can be interesting.  Although I played about 16hours total messing around with the builder, I grew tired of the single player aspect.

For me, I would not recommend this game do to the lack of multiplayer. Although this is just my opinion.  If multiplayer is added in a way to have a realtime race even without collision, I would recommend this game.  As it is now I would not.

review:
Very awesome game, remember to reduce the elasticity of your frame parts - it'll save you an awful lot of early game frustration. 

The only thing really I would add to the game is some legitimate controller support, it would be nice if there was a more analog approach to gassing and braking instead of using WASD which makes for 100% gas and 100% brake whenever you touch the controls. A user friendly tutorial wouldn't hurt either, sort of reminds me of starting out in Beseige.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999993890', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 4000, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3748, 'last_played': 1514384266}
review:
Si te gustan los coches  y los juegos de edicion,este juego te va a gustar.
Un juego sencillo intuitivo y con algo de dificultad a su vez.
-¿Sencillo porque? porque si intentas hacer algo parecido con algún programa de edición 3d tipo blender o 3dmark te puedes tirar 1 año si no sabes XD.Aparte de que,solo harias el diseño no podrias pobrarlo. si lo haces con el "garrys mod" tardaras medio año. :V
-¿Intuitivo porque? porque el juego no esta en español y mi nivel de ingles es bajo/nulo.¿te vale? XD.Ademas vienen tutoriales con imagenes,que prácticamente no hace falta traducirlo.
-¿Dificil porque? porque cada pieza tienes que calibrarla muy bien con los parámetros que trae,si no,tendras un amasijo de hierros.

El juego solo dispone de 1 mapa (es gigantesco),en el que tendremos que ir recogiendo monedas con nuestro coche para despues ir evolucionando las piezas,o tambien cuenta con un sistema de carreras contra la I.A. en el que genera circuitos aleatorios en ese mapa.
Ademas se pueden descargar coches y mapas que va creando la comunidad(todo gratis), y asi ya no tienes escusa para recoger las monedas XD. 

Las 2 unicas pegas que le veo al juego son:
-No tiene musica,solo sonidos de los efectos.(podrian aver buscado alguna musica sin copiright.....)
-Precio 14.99 Alto. (pero si tienes en cuenta que el juego esta en fase de desarrollo,yo lo veo más una donación) o te lo pillas de oferta. Precio merecido si fuese el producto final.9.99 pero repito esta en fase de desarrollo XD. lo compraria igual aunque fuese el producto final  :V

author: {'steamid': '76561198046169725', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1361, 'last_played': 1487157482}
review:
In short, I think this game is a great idea. I quite enjoy it, it's fun making your own creation from whatever your imagination can think of and then get to use your idea or publish it for others to enjoy! I haven't been on lately to check out the latest updates but so far I think if there were some way to add support for gamepads or in my case a force feedback wheel and some close racing or even destruction derby/ last vehicle standing wins would make it more awesome. The game could also benefit from greater detail on parts like gearboxes, dedicated steering systems and wheel hubs etc which I believe are in development for the future. 

Cheers RoKo0 for all your hard work on this game!

Highly recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561197973141625', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 789, 'last_played': 1514835750}
review:
Amazingly fun game, difficult to figure out, but amazing once you do. Building cars in real life is one of my favorite past-times, so having some place where it doesn't cost me money to try out ideas is a great thing!

If you have no creative imagination, this may not be the game for you, but if you love to tinker, then buy it right away!  I have only successfully built one solid vehicle so far, but getting into designing something to find out if it works is a lot of fun. 

Put the frame together, attach some wheels, an engine, shocks, and steering rod, and watch as it crumbles to pieces because you didn't brace it properly. Laugh about it, go back to the garage and figure out where you went wrong. If you build something worthy, set up a race, and challenge others to drive your custom car through waypoints to see if they can drive it better than you can! 

Overall, the game is still actively changing, but the developer is one that truly cares about the game, going so far as to talk to me personally, and ask me what I think. Never had this experience with any game before, so I can honestly say that I am excited to see what this game becomes!

author: {'steamid': '76561198333971756', 'num_games_owned': 21, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 9525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1847, 'last_played': 1704178300}
review: This is one of the best games i have ever seen. To be honest, this game is better than a lot of other racing games. Just to have the ability to make your own car, and i'm not saying just taking a car and being able to modify it, i mean build it from the bottom up. even if your not that creative and can't build a good car, you can always rely on the community. there are some SPECTACULAR creations made by the community. compared to a game such as rocket league, Dream car racing is first of all, cheaper and better in a lot of ways (almost all of them). definitely my go-to game for everything.

review: This building and simulator/racing game is awesome! Building can be tricky at first but once you learn how to build some suspension/steering combinations you can build vehicles piece by piece to create your dream car.

author: {'steamid': '76561198202491964', 'num_games_owned': 34, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1651, 'last_played': 1671230173}
review:
This game is great. It's still got quite a way to go but it's good as is already.

The GUI is something to get used to at first if you've never done something like 3D modeling before, but it's easy to learn.

It's nice to be able to share and publish cars, be it on the workshop or in-game. You can find some amazing designs if you know where to look.

The most fun part of the game IMO is figuring out what will and will not make your car better, and how to optimize your car for different types of terrain. 

 I've always loved DCR evo and the fact that it's in 3D makes it all the more fun, and more challenging too. Because it's 3D  now there's so many more possibilities, i was actually running out of potential designs in Evo so this was great. 

My only tip is the price. 15 bucks is hefty for what you're getting, if it were a bit more polished(which it is becoming) i'd be okay with it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984275550', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 7973, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3038, 'last_played': 1578162828}
review:
This is really the kind of game that can be enjoyed by players who love to create and share their creations, play with realistic physics and enjoy driving vehicles.

PROS :

- The editor is practical. Using the 3 different views you can easily and precisely place a point wherever you want. A grid allows you to create well aligned stuff. It may look scary at first, but it's far, far, FAR simpler to use than a 3D modeling program. Within a few hours you will have understood all the basics required to make a complete car, chassis and bodywork, without having to read any kind of tutorial.

- The games seems to be very optimized. You can add hundreds or parts to a car without ever noticing a framerate drop. It seems for example to be a lot optimized than other games such as Scrap Mechanic. As of today I have been able to create whatever I wanted to create without even thinking about performance.

- The physics are realistic. Each part can strech, compress, vibrate, etc.

- The (only) developper of the game seems to be very active and seems to care about the feedbacks of player, which is a very encouraging point.

- The price. I paid this game about 11€. I think it's a fair price for this game in its current state.

CONS :

- The game has currently  very little content. You can do races along a track vs little ghost cars. You can drive around, trying to reach a checkpoint after another. You can roam freely to test your creation. And it seems like you can also play online multiplayer, without collisions between players, but I've no tested that yet. This is not surprising considering that this game is only a few monthes old. You wouldn't expect such a recent game to have a lot of content, especially since there is only one developper working on it.

- There is not a lot of information about how to use the game. There is an in-game help which provides informations about the parts and their physical properties. However I think it would have been nice to have a little wiki and a few more tutorial videos for beginners. For instance, I took me a while to search information about what the "angle lock" part was used for. All the tutorial videos I could find were created before the update that introduced this part, so I couldn't find more information about it.

- The developper working on this seems to be almost alone. While he seems to be very active, I'm not sure whether we can expect frequent updates or not, and how much content will come with each update.

- The graphics are really outdated. I know that it's not what people would come for when buying this game, but since it's about being realistic, graphics matter too. Currently there are no asphalt marks, the wheels sometimes seem to sink a bit into the ground because the hitbox of the wheels get deformed based on tire pressure while the 3D model remains solid, there are no beautiful shadows or god rays, and since the maps can be procedurally and randomly generated, there are not many details. I think some official race tracks where players could compete would have been great.

CONLUSION :

I think it's a game worthy of its price which provides you with a freedom that you will never find in any other game that currently exist. There are concurrents like Scrap Mechanic or even Garry's mod, but none of them have the good performances and the freedom of building provided by Dream Car Racing 3D.
Just like with any other early access game, the game has very little content, but it already allows you to create fully functionnal creations without any performance issue and that can be shared on the workshop, which is a very good start. The developpers seems to be planning to add more parts like wings, which suggest that we will be able to create other things than wheeled vehicles in the future.
So in the end, if you like creating and inventing stuff, showing other people what you're capable of and enjoy realistic physics, if you have time and patience, if you care about creating quality stuff, then go for this game. You will probably like it, and even if you don't, well that's not even the price of a meal at McDonalds...

author: {'steamid': '76561197990757214', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 887, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 637, 'last_played': 1571224311}
review:
If you're passoned about cars and how they're made and would like to play around that, this game is for you.

The build section actually feels more like simulation; finding the right geometry to make the chassis act like you want it to, finetuning the strenght of the parts to optimize the weight without compromising the structural integrity...the physics have all of the latest soft body simulation you could expect from a modern video game. Reminds me of BeamNG, but with a much appreciated DIY editor built in.
Wether you want to make a basic road car, a monster truck or a formula one inspired geoetries, you will find all the elements you need to put your ideas into a driveable car!

Racing then becomes so much more gratifying when you're the author of your vehicule; The single player mode has an awesome progression feature that lets you upgrade the different elements as you win longer and harder races, while the sandbox mode and online challenges adds a nice competitive side to it.

The game itself is already in a very advanced state for being early access; it runs perfectly fine here with very little exception, yet the author keeps on adding features regardless, remaining open to suggestions from the users, which is very involving.

If you like the idea of playing in a community with an accent on creativity and sharing ideas, I highly recommend you this game.

Hoping to see you around on the scoreboard and the workshop ;)
